comment: /**  * Returns the table connector name used for logging and web UI.  */
code: /**  * Returns the table connector name used for logging and web UI.  */ public static String generateRuntimeName(Class<?> clazz, String[] fields) {     String className = clazz.getSimpleName().     if (null == fields) {         return className + "(*)".     } else {         return className + "(" + String.join(", ", fields) + ")".     } }
